title: What are the things an artist can do in quarantine? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is the time when each one of us, should take responsibility to spread some happiness through music because of the small efforts we can convert the sadness and the silence around us into musical notes. There are few things which you can do in quarantine to keep you motivated because all you have to do is just to go with the flow. Riyaaz: This is the best time to work on your skills, whereas you can work upon your singing notes which you were not able to for a long time. There will no disturbance, no friends coming up, no big weekend plans, no gigs, no clients to serve and neither any outdoor activities.Networking: It is one of the most important things to keep in mind, When did the last time you called an artist manager for networking? Go through your phonebook or even you can visit us at Live101 discuss, share and network. You never know which network or contact can bring you luck, and a great opportunity once the event industry settles up. Own Profile: Here's the right time to work upon your digital artist profile for your future work and client inquiries. You can search and invest enough time to make the best outcome.Digital Platforms: Upload your last gigs edited videos and pictures which you might have forgot to upload it before. You might haven't utilized the available digital platforms fully, like Facebook, Youtube, Instagram, Tiktok, etc. This is the time to create your youtube channel, work upon your Facebook profile, be a part of some live streaming gigs or even upload your videos.Clients and Family: This music industry can be a bit hectic sometimes, you are either traveling or performing, so this is the time you can invest with your family, with your parents, share your dreams with them, allow them to be a part of your journey. And don't forget your good clients, do something special for them too, share some of your videos, take a song request and keep them connected with you.We Indians believe that we can overcome this situation with our great spirit and unity. So let's get prepared for the post-Covid19 Pandemic. Until then, Stay Safe, Stay Inside, Stay Musical! Hire Professional Live Entertainers on Live101
